favourite.article: The highest kind of love is divine, pure and endless. This is God Himself because God is love and through this love we could love others. Amen.
Only the love of the Lord Jesus never fails. O, Lord Jesus! Amen, Amen, Amen...
Amen, praise the Lord! We should let Christ our first love. Amen, Amen, Amen, Amen. Love never falls away.

All around us is only hatred. By ourselves, we have no love. Love is an attribute of God, and is only found in His Son, our Lord Jesus Christ. It is only when we have Jesus constituted in us can this love be expressed. Can you see this sweet Jesus in this beautiful song?
If you do not want to suffer then you should never attempt to love anything.
Praise the Lord! Love is God Himself. He is in me and I'm in Him. Thus I can take Him as my very love. Hallelujah, He never falls away.
